name: The Exit (HazzerIO, ConfuciusKongze, Gorosei)
description:
The Exit is a short puzzle game that combines problem solving with time travel. By using the rewind mechanic the player can jump up onto high platforms or open doors by pressing buttons. Will you be able to solve the puzzles? Created for the NUCATS 2021 gamejam

Features:

  • 20 minutes of gameplay 
  • A unique rewind mechanic
  • A range of puzzels with a spread of difficulty
